headline: Intestinal Front-Numbers: In Nevada, Finding a Jackpot Of Very Old Guts
abstract: The find in a Nevada desert revealed an intestine inside a creature that looks like a worm made of a stack of ice cream cones.
lead_paragraph: They say you should trust your gut, which is what Emmy Smith did when she went hunting for fossils in 2016. Dr. Smith, a field geologist, had a hunch she would find something interesting at a site north of Pahrump, Nev., and she did. But what her gut hadnâ€™t told her was that some of those fossils would turn out to contain the oldest known animal guts on the planet.
